strings.Value: "Greetings, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}! I'm working myself day and night, producing orders for your army. One particular item turned out too fine to serve a simple soldier. It would be more suitable for you, or one of your loyal comrades."

{n}Dragn's face attempts to look reserved and solemn, but he cannot hide his contented smile.{/n} "{mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}! I see things are looking up for your lands, as well as in my smithy. Your army grows, giving me more work, and your subjects show ever more respect to their ruler â€“ and his court craftsmen as well. Allow me to present this token of appreciation."
"Take this gift. To our gracious ruler, from {mf|his|her} master craftsman, Dragn."
